name: Jira
description: The JIRA connector allows you to connect to JIRA, an online issue-tracking database. The connector uses the JIRA REST API version 6.1 to connect to JIRA, view, and update issues, work with filters, and more.

params.name: linkId
params.description: The ID of the issue link to retrieve.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

params.name: projectIdOrKey
params.description: The unique ID or key of the Jira project for which to retrieve components.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

params.name: expand
params.description: Comma-separated list of fields to expand (e.g., 'renderedBody').

params.name: responseVariable

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

params.name: name

params.name: overwriteBody

params.name: issueIdOrKey
params.description: The ID or key of the Jira issue to be transitioned.

params.name: issueFields
params.description: A JSON object specifying the transition ID and optional fields (e.g., { "transition": { "id": "31" } }).

params.description: The ID of the comment to be updated.

params.description: The updated comment content.

params.name: visibleRole
params.description: Restrict visibility of the comment to a specific Jira role (e.g., 'Administrators').

params.name: expand
params.description: Comma-separated expand options, such as 'renderedBody' to get the HTML version of the comment.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.description: The JQL query string used to search for issues.

params.name: maxResults
params.description: Maximum number of results to return.

params.name: startAt

params.name: fields

params.description: New description of the filter.

params.name: jqlType
params.description: JQL query type used in the filter. The full query will be 'type = [jqlType]'.

params.name: favourite
params.description: Set this filter as a favorite.

params.description: Comma-separated list of fields to expand (e.g., 'sharedUsers,subscriptions').

params.name: issueIdOrKey
params.description: The Jira issue ID or key associated with this notification.

params.name: subject
params.description: Subject of the notification message.

params.name: textBody
params.description: Plain text body content of the notification.

params.name: htmlBody
params.description: HTML formatted content for the notification.

params.name: toReporter
params.description: Whether to notify the issue reporter.

params.name: toAssignee
params.description: Whether to notify the assignee.

params.name: toWatchers
params.description: Whether to notify the watchers of the issue.

params.name: toVoters
params.description: Whether to notify users who voted for the issue.

params.name: toUsers
params.description: JSON array of usernames to notify (e.g., ['user1','user2']).

params.name: toGroups
params.description: JSON array of group names to notify (e.g., ['jira-users','admins']).

params.name: restrictGroups
params.description: JSON array of group names to restrict notification visibility (e.g., ['support-team']).

params.name: restrictPermissions
params.description: JSON array of permissions required to view this notification (e.g., ['Browse Projects']).

params.name: connectionName

params.description: Username used to log in to Jira.

params.name: password
params.description: Password used to log in to Jira.

params.name: blocking
params.description: Indicates whether the connector should perform blocking invocations to Jira.

params.name: uri
params.description: URI of the Jira instance, e.g., https://<site-url>/

operations.name: createFilter
operations.description: Creates a new filter, and returns newly created filter. Currently sets permissions just using the users default sharing permissions

operations.name: getFavouriteFilters
operations.description: Returns the favourite filters of the logged-in user.

operations.name: getFilterById
operations.description: Returns a filter given an id

operations.name: updateFilterById
operations.description: Updates an existing filter, and returns its new value.

operations.name: getGroup
operations.description: Returns REST representation for the requested group

operations.name: listGroupPicker
operations.description: Returns groups with substrings matching a given query.

operations.name: listGroupUserPicker
operations.description: Returns a list of users and groups matching query with highlighting.

operations.name: getTransitions
operations.description: get transitions for the requested jira

operations.name: doTransition
operations.description: change transitions for the requested jira

operations.name: deleteComment
operations.description: delete comment of the given jira issue

operations.name: getVotesForIssue
operations.description: get vote for the requested jira

operations.name: addAttachmentToIssueId
operations.description: Add one or more attachments to an issue.

operations.name: getIssuePriorities
operations.description: Get a list of issue priorities.

operations.name: getIssuePriorityById
operations.description: Get information about issue priority by ID.

operations.name: getIssueTypes
operations.description: Get issue types defined in the system.

operations.name: getIssueTypeById
operations.description: Get information about issue type by ID.

operations.name: createBulkIssue
operations.description: Creates many issues in one bulk operation.

operations.name: assignIssueToUser
operations.description: Assigns an issue to a user.

operations.name: getCommentById
operations.description: Returns all comments for an issue.

operations.name: sendNotification
operations.description: Sends a notification (email) to the list or recipients defined in the request.

operations.name: addVotesForIssue
operations.description: Cast your vote in favour of an issue.

operations.name: getWatchersForIssue
operations.description: Returns the list of watchers for the issue with the given key.

operations.name: removeUserFromWatcherList
operations.description: Removes a user from an issue's watcher list.

operations.name: getAvatarsForProject
operations.description: returns all avatars which are visible for the currently logged in user. The avatars are grouped into system and custom.

operations.name: getComponentsOfProject
operations.description: Contains a full representation of a the specified project's components.

operations.name: getStatusesOfProject
operations.description: Get all issue types with valid status values for a project.

operations.name: getVersionsOfProject
operations.description: Contains a full representation of a the specified project's versions.

operations.name: getRolesOfProject
operations.description: Contains a list of roles in this project with links to full details.

operations.name: getRolesByIdOfProject
operations.description: Details on a given project role.

operations.name: setActorsToRoleOfProject
operations.description: Set actors to a given project role.

operations.name: getUserAssignableProjects
operations.description: Returns a list of users that match the search string and can be assigned issues for all the given projects. This resource cannot be accessed anonymously.

operations.name: getUserPermissions
operations.description: Get permissions granted for current user

operations.name: searchAssignableUser
operations.description: Returns a list of assignable users that match the given issue.

operations.name: searchIssueViewableUsers
operations.description: Given an issue key this resource will provide a list of users that match the search string and have the browse issue permission for the issue provided.

operations.name: getAttachmentById
operations.description: Returns the meta-data for an attachment, including the URI of the actual attached file.

operations.name: getAttachmentContent
operations.description: Returns the content of an attachment.

operations.name: countComponentRelatedIssues
operations.description: Returns counts of issues related to this component.

operations.name: createIssueLink
operations.description: Creates an issue link between two issues.

operations.name: getIssueLinkById
operations.description: Returns an issue link with the specified id.

operations.name: createFilter
operations.description: Creates a new filter, and returns newly created filter. Currently sets permissions just using the users default sharing permissions

operations.name: getFavouriteFilters
operations.description: Returns the favourite filters of the logged-in user.

operations.name: getFilterById
operations.description: Returns a filter given an id

operations.name: updateFilterById
operations.description: Updates an existing filter, and returns its new value.

operations.name: getGroup
operations.description: Returns REST representation for the requested group

operations.name: listGroupPicker
operations.description: Returns groups with substrings matching a given query.

operations.name: listGroupUserPicker
operations.description: Returns a list of users and groups matching query with highlighting.
